message: In the legal world, the competition can be fierce. Setting yourself apart in a way that displays your expertise, while creating an engaging space for clients can feel impossible. But look no further! Video is your answer. This webinar will explore just how video can work for you in your  practice, walking you through how to’s for video strategy, production, and use.

You’re invited to join guest speaker Robert Weiss as he shares a comprehensive way to use video to your law firm’s advantage through strategic planning. Law Firm Video 101: Establishing Trust With an Effective Video Strategy begins promptly at 2 p.m. ET/11 a.m. PT on Friday March 1, 2024.
bottomline: Seats are limited, so reserve yours today!

message: Reminder: You are registered for Law Firm Video 101: Establishing Trust With an Effective Video Strategy on Friday, March 1, 2024 at 2 p.m. ET/11 a.m. PT.
You can use this link to join us.
If you have trouble, please contact Justia Support for assistance.

Have you ever wanted to make videos for your firm, but have no idea where to start? In this webinar, we’re taking the intimidation out of video for law firms. Join us as guest speaker Robert Weiss walks you through how to develop a video strategy, how to create videos specific to your firm’s needs, and how to use those videos effectively.
Law Firm Video 101: Establishing Trust With an Effective Video Strategy begins promptly at 2 p.m. ET/11 a.m. PT on Friday, March 1, 2024.
BONUS: Join and receive a FREE copy of Robert's eBook "Video Production & Video Marketing Tips" to help your video strategy even more!

Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation, Law Firm Video 101: Establishing Trust With an Effective Video Strategy. We love connecting our members with new learning opportunities and hope you found the webinar both engaging and informative.
As we continue to plan future Justia Webinars for Justia Connect members, we want to hear from you! If you have not already done so, please share your feedback about your recent webinar experience.
Do you have an idea for a future speaker or topic? Let us know!
